title: I can't install AFDKO
content:
Hello,

I followed the instructions in FDK package for the installation on Mac  
but I get this message when run "autohint -h"

/Users/seb/bin/FDK/Tools/osx/autohint: line 18: /Users/seb/bin/FDK/Tools/osx/Python/Current/bin/python: No such file or directory

unfortunately I have no experience in using the terminal. I have no clue as to what went wrong

thanks  
Seb
author: sebsan

comments.content: Try downloading and installing again and be careful not to move anything out of the FDK folder and also not to move the FDK folder itself after you have executed `FinishInstallOSX`.
